links.*: Of the Return of the Noldor
Of the Sun and Moon and the Hiding of Valinor

wikitext.*:
{{ardayearheader|Year of the Trees 1497|Year of the Trees 1498|Year of the Trees 1500|1|2|5|6}}
* The first rising of the [[Sun]] marks a new [[Years of the Sun|reckoning of time]],<ref group="note">It should be noted that F.A. 1 is '''not''' the first year of the First Age ''per se'', but rather '''the first measurable [[Years of the Sun|Year of the Sun]] within that Age''', since it began in {{YT|1050}} with the [[Awakening of the Elves]].</ref> and the end of the [[Sleep of Yavanna]].<ref name="Men">{{S|Men}}</ref><ref name="GA">{{GA|52-7}}, p. 30-1</ref> [[Morgoth]] and his servants cannot bear the light of the Sun.<ref>{{S|Sun}}</ref><ref>{{AA|173-181}}, p. 131-4</ref>
* The Second [[Children of Ilúvatar|Children]] of [[Ilúvatar]], [[Men]], [[Awakening of Men|awake]] in the far east in [[Hildórien]]. Morgoth then leaves [[Angband]] in secret, committing command of the [[Battles of Beleriand|war]] to [[Sauron]]; he seeks to corrupt Men.<ref name="Men"/><ref name="GA"/>
* With the first sunrise, the host of [[Fingolfin]] arrives in [[Mithrim]] after the crossing of the [[Helcaraxë]].<ref name="GA"/><ref name="Return">{{S|Return}}</ref>
* Fingolfin marches unopposed across [[Dor Daedeloth]] and bangs on the [[Gates of Angband]]; however, Morgoth remains hidden.<ref name="GA"/><ref name="Return"/>

{{references|notes}}
